member.name: T:Services.EdmBuilder
member.summary: Builds an entity framework entity data model.

member.name: M:Services.EdmBuilder.GetEdmModelCustom(System.IServiceProvider,Microsoft.OData.ModelBuilder.ODataModelBuilder)
member.summary: Add custom EDM builder code here.

member.name: P:Services.Startup.LogicalNames
member.summary: This property will be populated later by the default SelfHostEnvironment class. It wil contain a list of all of the logical names used to locate data files in the repository. This information can be useful if implementing a custom FileSpecResolver class, which is done in the Services Assembly, which is why the collection is defined here.

member.name: M:Services.Startup.ConfigureServices(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection)
member.summary: This methoid is used to make services available to the application. These services are typically accessed via dependency injection in controller classes. The primary purpose of the ConfigureServices method is as a place to register implementations of types for services that are needed by the application. It is also used to configure any options related to those services.

member.name: M:Services.Startup.Configure(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder,Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.IHostingEnvironment)
member.summary: This method is used to configure the ASP.NET WebApi request pipeline.
member.param: IApplicationBuilder component that configures the request pipeline by having middleware added to it.
IHostingEnvironment that exposes information about the environment that is hosting the application.

member.name: M:Services.Startup.ConfigureServicesCustom(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection)
member.summary: Declare the ConfigueServicesCustom partial method. Developers can implement this method in a partial class to provide custom services.

member.name: M:Services.Startup.ConfigureCustom(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder,Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.IHostingEnvironment)
member.summary: Declare the ConfigueCustom partial method Developers can implement this method in a partial class to provide custom configuration.

member.name: M:Services.Startup.ConfigureCustomBeforeMvc(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder,Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.IHostingEnvironment)
member.summary: Declare the ConfigueCustom partial method called immediately before AddMvc Developers can implement this method in a partial class to provide custom configuration.
